bibl.title: A Man from Provence on the Middle Nile: A Graffito in the Upper Church at Banganarti.
bibl.note: General presentation of a Nubian inscription left by a man called Benedictus, a European merchant who was probably living in Dongola in the 13th century.

bibl.title: Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.seg: Adam Łajtar & Tomasz Płóciennik, A Man from Provence on the Middle Nile: A Graffito in the Upper Church at Banganarti.

Adam Łajtar & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), with the assistance of Grzegorz Ochała & Giovanni Ruffini, Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XV (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 96-119, 5 figg.
General presentation of a Nubian inscription left by a man called Benedictus, a European merchant who was probably living in Dongola in the 13th century.
